actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to conduct a weekly sampling of State non-member bank deposits which shall be transmitted to the Federal Reserve Board for usage in the conduct of monetary policy.

summary.text: Monetary Policy Data Improvement Act - Authorizes the Board of Directors of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to call for a weekly report from State nonmember banks of deposit and cash items held by a sampling of at least 1,000 such banks, including those having deposits exceeding $100,000,000. Directs that such report be made available to the Federal Reserve Board.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to conduct a weekly sampling of State non-member bank deposits which shall be transmitted to the Federal Reserve Board for usage in the conduct of monetary policy.
